title: Birthright: A Vision into the Plight of Southeastern Indigenous Culture through the Eyes of Guernica
creator: John Henry Gloyne
description: A "remix of Picassos Guernica" that "depicts the horrors of colonialism and mound desecration from a Cherokee perspective."
